text: Martin A. Sandoval (January 12, 1964 â€“ December 5, 2020) was a Democratic politician. He admitted guilt to corruption charges in 2020.. Contains PDF and text links to the plea agreement and charges against Sandoval. He was a member of the Illinois Senate from 2003 to 2020. Sandoval was born in Chicago. On December 5, 2020, Sandoval died at a hospital in Maywood, Illinois of COVID-19 at the age of 56. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Illinois Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Criminals from Chicago Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Martin Sandoval
